column5: I have a 98 100 merc starts up fine at the lanch but if yur still fishing for like 5 mins and go to start it u have to put the throttle down before starting and it will start. dont know if theres a adjustment  i can do but any help would be great.  thanks  sleded
First of all, put the question in understandable english.
Yer such an ol' crab, Fisherman!!!
If you need to speed up the throttle on a warm engine to get it to start after 5min it is probably flooding.  Lots of smoke after starting?  One of the float needles in the carbs is leaking.
No I'm a bit more slender like a crayfish..
